title: #148: Getting Yourself Ready
description:
The time has come to put our plans into action. We have discussed what to do in the event that something unpredictable happens, and it seems that the time is now to actually do the things that we know we should do but have been putting off.

We are going to get specific about what you need, where to get it, how much to acquire, and why now. We are talking about adding additional revenue streams to our current cash flows, and we are discussing actual solutions and ideas on how to make this happen.

The time for getting prepared is right now. The time for increasing your revenue streams and setting up passive income is right now. The time for thinking about what is heading our way is right now, and the time for moving into the “action” phase of the plan starts immediately.
